pages.title: Lens of Ender
pages.text: A Lens of Ender can be added to a Solar Panel to generate energy even if blocks are above the Solar Panel. Right-click a Solar Panel with a Lens of Ender in your hand to add it to the Solar Panel. $(p)A Lens of Ender is created by crafting a Photoelectric Pane and right-clicking it on an Enderman or Endermite.
Right-click a Photoelectric Pane on an Enderman or Endermite to make it a Lens of Ender.
